title: memo
description: Memo objects represent arbitrary data that can be included in a transaction

type.description: Conventionally, a unique relation (according to [RFC 5988](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5988#section-4)) that defines the format of this memo. Only characters allowed in URLs are permitted.

format.description: Conventionally containing information on how the memo is encoded, for example as a [MIME type](http://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/media-types.xhtml). Only characters allowed in URLs are permitted.

data.description: Arbitrary string, conventionally containing the content of the memo.
